overview: The Hexxed Branch is a mount-summoning item which summons a rideable Tree Mount. It is dropped by the Mourning Wood in Master Mode with a 1/4 (25%) chance. The Tree Mount is a ground-based mount; it is unable to fly. While travelling at full speed, enemies in its path will be hit by 120 base summon damage.
notes: The top running speed of the Tree Mount is 82 mph, reached after 0.533 seconds. Its maximum diagonal speed is 96 mph, achieved by jumping off a ledge at full speed.
tips: The Tree Mount's acceleration is extraordinarily high. It achieves high speed very quickly without a dash (e.g. Tabi or Shield of Cthulhu) and can allow one to make sharp turns midair if it is summoned while falling, making it rather useful for boss fights.
title: Hexxed Branch
tooltip: 'A wand crafted from the branch of a cursed tree.'
